mapper.select: select video.uid, video.message_uid, video.caption, video.width, video.height, video.duration, video.file_size, video.file_name, video.mime_type, video.supports_streaming, video.file_unique_id, video.thumbnail_id, f.uid, f.file_size, f.file_unique_id, f.local_file_path, f.last_modified from message_video video left join file f on video.file_unique_id = f.file_unique_id left join message on message.uid = video.message_uid where message.type != 'MessageVideoX' AND video.message_uid = #{messageUid}
